member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseCapability
member.summary: For creating an BaseResource via ERP transmission.

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource
member.summary: For creating an BaseResource via ERP transmission.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.Sort
member.summary: Can be used for sorting Resources in Gantt Charts, reports, etc.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.Active
member.summary: If not Active, then no new Activities can be scheduled to use this Resource. This does not affect Activiites already scheduled to use the Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.Workcenter
member.summary: The name of the workcenter in the ERP system. For information only.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.WorkcenterExternalId
member.summary: The ID of the workcenter in the ERP system. For information only.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.ResourceType
member.summary: The type of physical entity represented by the Resource. Used for custom reports and other display groupings.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.DisallowDragAndDrops
member.summary: If true then drag and drop of Activities on the Resource are not allowed.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.GanttRowHeightFactor
member.summary: Controls how tall the row is relative to other rows. Valid ranges is from 1 (shortest) to 10 (tallest).

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.ImageFileName
member.summary: Name (with suffix but not path) of which image to use in the Gantt, etc to represent this Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.MaxCumulativeQty
member.summary: Often used to model "tank capacity" or "subcontractor capacity", this is the maximum quantity of simultaneous Activities allowed on the Resource. Violations create Block Flags. A Block is Flagged if the total Start Quantity of Activities beginning but not yet ending on the Resource exceeds this quantity. Set this value to zero to turn it off. This is not a constraint -- it is a Flag only.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.ExcludeFromReports
member.summary: Whether the Resource should be excluded from Schedule Reports. This is often set to true for inactive resources, etc.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.ExcludeExceptFromDepartment
member.summary: Whether the Resource should be excluded from the full plants gantt, and all act mode in the activity grid. This could be set for tooling, labor etc.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.ExcludeFromGantts
member.summary: Whether the Resource should be excluded from Resource Gantts. This is often set to true for inactive resources, etc.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.ExcludeFromCapacityPlan
member.summary: Whether the Resource should be excluded from the Capacity Plan display. This has no effect on scheduling.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.ManualAssignmentOnly
member.summary: Whether the Resource only be assigned manually and not during Optimizations.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.NumberOfResources
member.summary: The number of Resources that should be created from this Resource definition. The value must be at least 1. If the value is greater than 1 then copies of the Resource will be created with an ExternalId and Name that have a '-n' appended where n is the index number.

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.BaseResource.Connector
member.summary: Identifies a successor resource in a resource connection relationship.

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.Definitions
member.summary: Summary description for Definitions.

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.Definitions.PerformImportResult
member.summary: The result of running the PerformImport command of the importer service.

member.name: F:PT.ERPTransmissions.Definitions.PerformImportResult.Started
member.summary: The import was started.

member.name: F:PT.ERPTransmissions.Definitions.PerformImportResult.Busy
member.summary: The import couldn't be started because an import was already in process.

member.name: F:PT.ERPTransmissions.Definitions.PerformImportResult.Failed
member.summary: The import couldn't be started because the call to the importer service failed. Possible causes include not being able to access the importer service, the importer service not running, ...

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.ERPMaintenanceTransmission`1
member.summary: Summary description for ERPMaintenanceTransmission.

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.ERPTransmission
member.summary: This is the base class of all manufacturing system transmissions.

member.name: M:PT.ERPTransmissions.ERPTransmission.ulongUserConnectionNbrReader(PT.Common.IReader)
member.summary: For backwards compatibility with the ulong version of user connections.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.ERPTransmission.UserConnectionNbr
member.summary:
This is an optional value. You may use it to specify the Planet Together connection number of the user who caused this transmission to be sent. If you set it, the client of Planet Together may use it to display error messages on the Planet Together user's window.
This value may be different from the ConnectionNbr because the ConnectionNbr refers to the actual connection on which the transmission was broadcast, for instance a connection number established from the Planet Together Interface service.

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.IdList
member.summary: Defines a list of External Ids. These can be used for various purposes such as specifying a list of Capability Ids for a Resource

member.name: M:PT.ERPTransmissions.IdList.Contains(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether an ExternalId exists in the list.
member.param: ExternalId of the object
member.returns: true if ExternalId Exists in the list

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT
member.summary: Summary description for InternalActivityUpdateT.

member.name: M:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.#ctor(PT.SchedulerDefinitions.InternalActivityDefs.productionStatuses,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Updates the status of an Activity, fully specifying its identification and scheduled Resource. If the Activity is not already scheduled on the Scheduled Resource then it will be moved there if the Resource is eligible.
member.param: The current status of the Activity. Activities cannot have their status updated in reverse of this sequence: SettingUp, Running, PostProcessing, Transferring, Finished.
The ExternalId of the Job.
The ExternalId of the Manufacturing Order.
The ExternalId of the Operation.
The ExternalId of the Activity.

The PlantExternalId of a Resource on which the Activity is currently scheduled. This can be used to identify an Activity if the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are not specified. If the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are specified then this can be used to move the Activity to this Resource.

The DepartmentExternalId of a Resource on which the Activity is currently scheduled. This can be used to identify an Activity if the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are not specified. If the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are specified then this can be used to move the Activity to this Resource.

The ExternalId of a Resource on which the Activity is currently scheduled. This can be used to identify an Activity if the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are not specified. If the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are specified then this can be used to move the Activity to this Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.JobExternalId
member.summary: The ExternalId of the Job.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ManufacturingOrderExternalId
member.summary: The ExternalId of the Manufacturing Order.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.OperationExternalId
member.summary: The ExternalId of the Operation.

member.summary: The ExternalId of the Activity.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ScheduledPlantExternalId
member.summary: The PlantExternalId of a Resource on which the Activity is currently scheduled. This can be used to identify an Activity if the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are not specified. If the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are specified then this can be used to move the Activity to this Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ScheduledDeptExternalId
member.summary: The DepartmentExternalId of a Resource on which the Activity is currently scheduled. This can be used to identify an Activity if the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are not specified. If the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are specified then this can be used to move the Activity to this Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ScheduledResourceExternalId
member.summary: The ExternalId of a Resource on which the Activity is currently scheduled. This can be used to identify an Activity if the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are not specified. If the Operation and Activity ExternalIds are specified then this can be used to move the Activity to this Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ProductionStatus
member.summary: The current status of the Activity. Activities cannot have their status updated in reverse of this sequence: SettingUp, Running, PostProcessing, Transferring, Finished.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ReportedFinishDate
member.summary: This value is used only when the the activity has been finished.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ReportedStartDate
member.summary: This value is used only when the the activity has been finished.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.PeopleUsage
member.summary: Determines how many people are allocated to an Activity in the schedule.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.NbrOfPeople
member.summary: If PeopleUsage is set to UseSpecifiedNbr then this is the maximum number of people that will be allocated to the Activity. Fewer than this number will be allocated during time periods over which the Primary Resource's Nbr Of People is less than this value.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.Comments
member.summary: Text that can be entered by operators or loaded from bar code systems.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.Comments2
member.summary: Text that can be entered by operators or loaded from bar code systems.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ReportedSpansAreIncremental
member.summary: If true then all Reported Spans are added to the current total for the Activity. Otherwise, they are treated as replacement values.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ReportedQtiesAreIncremental
member.summary: If true then all Reported Quantities are added to the current total for the Activity. Otherwise, they are treated as replacement values.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.ReportedBy
member.summary: The name or identifier of the person who entered the transaction in the data collection system.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.Timestamp
member.summary: The date/time when the transaction occurred in the data collection system.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalActivityUpdateT.ActivityStatusUpdate.Notes
member.summary: Text to be added to the History, etc.

member.name: T:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource
member.summary: For creating an InternalResource via ERP transmission.

member.name: F:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.plantExternalId
member.summary: This value is only used by ERP Link to construct Machines.

member.name: F:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.departmentExternalId
member.summary: This value is only used by ERP Link to construct Machines.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.Role
member.summary: Indicatest the types of Resource Requirements for which the Resource is eligible. Main Resource Requirements set the duration of the Operation.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.BufferSpan
member.summary: Used by the Drum-Buffer-Rope Release rule to prevent starving of this resource thus keeping its utilization high.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CanPreemptMaterials
member.summary: Whether the Resource can drive the schedule by requesting that Material Requirments be delivered sooner than they are currently scheduled to start by ignoring them as constraints. This does NOT allow preemption of ConfirmedConstraints. See also: BaseOperation.IsConfirmedConstraint and MaterialRequirment.IsConfirmedConstraint. Only allowed outside the Scenario.KeepFeasibleSpan.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CanPreemptPredecessors
member.summary: Whether the Resource can drive the schedule by requesting that predecessor Operations start sooner than they are currently scheduled to start by ignoring them as constraints. This does NOT allow preemption of ConfirmedConstraints. See also: BaseOperation.IsConfirmedConstraint and MaterialRequirment.IsConfirmedConstraint. This does NOT allow scheduling before the c_EarliestPossibleFinish of an Operation. Only allowed outside the Scenario.KeepFeasibleSpan.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CanWorkOvertime
member.summary: Will cause suggestions for overtime to be generated for late activities where adding the overtime would cause the activity to complete earlier.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.ConsecutiveSetupTimes
member.summary: Controls whether Resource and Operation setup times are consecutive (added) or concurrent (the maximum is used).

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CycleEfficiencyMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplies run time to adjust for slower/faster Resources.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CycleSpanAlgorithm
member.summary: Name of the script used to override CycleSpan in Activities on this resource. If specified, this gives the absolute final value for CyclesSpan. Result must be non-negative double or zero will be substituted and an error will be logged.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.DurationDependsOnCapacity
member.summary: If true, then the length of the activities is based upon the amount of capacity available rather than only the setup/cycle/teardown times.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.HeadStartSpan
member.summary: During Optimizations, Activities are not permitted to start before JitStartDate-(SameSetupHeadstartMultiplier*setupSpan+HeadStartSpan). This can be used to prevent excessive inventory buildup and aid in grouping same-SetupCode Activities.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.Drum
member.summary: Whether to treat this Resource as a Drum when using the Drum-Buffer-Rope Release rule.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.MaxSameSetupSpan
member.summary: When using same-SetupCode Simulation rules, a setupCode change is forced after this many hours of cycle-time passes. Can be used to force periodic rotation between groups of products.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.Overlap
member.summary: Specifies when operations are considered ready to start processing on THIS Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.OvertimeHourlyCost
member.summary: Can be used for calculating schedule quality and in scripts.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.ProcessingStatus
member.summary: Specifies the Resource's status as of the last update.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.ScheduledRunSpanAlgorithm
member.summary: Name of the script used to calculate ScheduledRunSpan in Activities on this resource. If specified, this gives the absolute final value for ScheduledRunSpan. Result must be non-negative double or 1 will be substituted and an error will be logged.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.ScheduledSetupSpanAlgorithm
member.summary: Name of the script used to calculate ScheduledSetupSpan in Activities on this resource. If specified, this gives the absolute final value for ScheduledSetupSpan. Result must be non-negative double or zero will be substituted and an error will be logged.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.ScheduledTransferSpanAlgorithm
member.summary: Name of the script used to calculate ScheduledTransferSpan in Activities on this resource. If specified, this gives the absolute final value for ScheduledTransferSpan. Result must be non-negative double or zero will be substituted and an error will be logged.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.DiscontinueSameCellScheduling
member.summary: If set then same cell scheduling for predecessor operations is discontinued. But if this resource is part of a cell then the behavior is as usual and this resource's cell will become the new cell to try to schedule in.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.SameSetupHeadstartMultiplier
member.summary: Used in the calculation of how far an operation can be scheduled before c_JITstartDate. Larger values result in Activities with longer setups being allowed to start earlier to save a setup. During Optimizations, Activities are not permitted to start more c_JITstartDate-(SameSetupHeadstartMultiplier*currentSetupSpan+headStartSpan). Can be used to prevent excessive inventory buildup and aid in grouping same-setupCode Activities.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.Stage
member.summary: Used for multi-stage scheduling to allow scheduling of groups of resources stage by stage.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.SetupIncluded
member.summary: Specifies when setup times are applied. For Multi-Tasking Resources, setup is always included unless this value is set to 'Never'.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.SetupEfficiencyMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplies setup time to adjust for slower/faster setups.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.TransferSpan
member.summary: Successor Operations cannot start before this time passes after finishing the Operation. Resource is not consumed during this time.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.UseOperationSetupTime
member.summary: Whether to use the operation setup time.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.OmitSetupOnFirstActivity
member.summary: If true then the Setup Time on the first Activity scheduled on the Resource is always zero.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.OmitSetupOnFirstActivityInShift
member.summary: If true then the Setup Time on the first Activity scheduled on a Capacity Interval is always zero.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CanOffload
member.summary: Whether Activities can be reassigned from this Resource during Optimizations.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CapacityType
member.summary: If SingleTasking then only one Activity can be performed on the Resource at any point in time. If Infinite then any number of can be performed simultaneously. If MultiTasking then Operations with Attention Percent less than 100% may be scheduled to run simultaneously (up to a total of 100% across all Operations that are running at any one point in time on the Resource).

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.SetupSpan
member.summary: Time that must be spent to setup this resource whenever the preceding operation did not use this resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.StandardHourlyCost
member.summary: Can be used for calculating schedule quality and in scripts.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.AutoJoinSpan
member.summary: When AutoJoining, only Join for Operations that start before this amount of time after the Clock.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CurrentProductSetup
member.summary: The Product for which the Resource is currently or was most recently setup. This is used to calculate setup time for the first scheduled Activity on the Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CurrentSetupCode
member.summary: The SetupCode for which the Resource is currently or was most recently setup. This is used to calculate setup time for the first scheduled Activity on the Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.CurrentSetupNumber
member.summary: The SetupNumber for which the Resource is currently or was most recently setup. This is used to calculate setup time for the first scheduled Activity on the Resource.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.NoDefaultRecurringCapacityInterval
member.summary: Set to false in order to create a default online Recurring Capacity Interval. Set to true if the RCI will be loaded explicitly instead.

member.name: P:PT.ERPTransmissions.InternalResource.MinNbrOfPeople
member.summary: Activities that specify a NbrOfPeople less than this value cannot be scheduled on this Resource.
